alternateName: Gym workout and bodyweight exercise images

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Workout/Exercise Images dataset

keywords: subject > health and fitness > exercise > sports
name: Workout/Exercise Images
description:
This dataset was created by myself. This dataset contains pictures of people doing workouts. The name of the existing workout corresponds to the name of the folder listed. 

File format: JPEG image (.jpg)

**What is the method I use to collect all the data?** Some of the data that has been collected here is data that I made myself (by recording myself or my friends) and some I collected through web scrapping

**What are the data sources?** Mostly sourced from YouTube and Google Images

**How I extract the image from the video?**: I use VLC media player to extract video frames using scene filter feature

**What size is the images?** 480x360 for the images/frames that extracted from the videos, while those from other sources remain original

**Where can I find the video of the extracted frames/images?** You can find the original video on this [video dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/hasyimabdillah/workoutfitness-video)


Here are some people that are contributed in making this dataset with me:
- Jiwa Sambhuwara
- Robbie Mulkie Anakbudi
- I Gusti Made Wira Dhimas Prasada
